title: Computer-Based Music Theory Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music terminology and ability to read musical scores
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical approaches to music theory pedagogy for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental concepts of music theory (rhythm, tonality, scales).
Learners can design and apply music theory instructional methods utilizing diverse media (text/image/audio).
Learners can select appropriate instructional media tailored to learners' levels of musical intelligence.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
